weekly_top_story.headline: House Passes Fiscal Year 2026 Spending Bills Including Key Healthcare Extenders and PBM Reforms
weekly_top_story.summary: Congress passed a bipartisan FY2026 spending package providing $116.8 billion to HHS with extensions for Medicare telehealth flexibilities, Acute Hospital Care at Home waiver, and PBM transparency reforms, averting disruptions to critical healthcare programs amid fiscal pressures.

stories.headline: Weekly Roundup – January 24, 2026
stories.summary: Healthcare IT Today highlighted recent developments including new CIO positions and bonus features in health IT, signaling ongoing workforce and technology advancements critical for operational efficiency in healthcare delivery.
